blogs.title: The First Blog
blogs.body: Pastel blue is a pale blue shade with the hex code #A7C7E7, slightly redder and more muted than the very similar baby blue. Pastel blue, along with the rest of the pastel palette, was a characterizing color of both Rococo and Impressionist art.
blogs.author: Tavisha

blogs.title: Lets get Litty!
blogs.body: A party is a gathering of people who have been invited by a host for the purposes of socializing, conversation, recreation, or as part of a festival or other commemoration or celebration of a special occasion. A party will often feature food and beverages, and often conversation, music, dancing, or other forms of entertainment.
blogs.author: Abhi

blogs.title: Lunch Time
blogs.body: Just had a fire lunch it was amazing. We had pizza, garlic bread and cheesecake.
blogs.author: Abhi
